title.rendered: ATFX Launches WebTV from Trading Central

content.rendered:
UK-licensed broker ATFX has announced that it had partnered with Trading Central, an award-winning provider of market research to provide customers with live TV content to help them navigate the markets and analyze financial products.

WebTV is a service operated by Trading Central that provides news updates around the clock 5 days a week in English, Chinese and Arabic languages. The streaming service is aimed at ATFX’s customers in SouthEast Asia, China, and GCC countries, but the broker indicated that a total of ten languages are sought for this service.

The new service will give ATFX customers access to daily analyses of major currency pairs and stocks, as well as in-depth market research of financial sectors. Trade ideas will be provided based on breaking industry news and technical analysis strategies. On top of that, ATFX clients will get news updates to their social media channels, making it easier to act on information whilst on the move. This is a novel idea as traders continue to seek new trading ideas and opportunities in today’s volatile markets.
